languages.text: Провиденье Идиры говорит ей, что Лорд-капитану удалось обнаружить место, где находится дверь из ее видений. Идира умоляет отвести ее к этой загадочной двери.

traits.locale_text: Провиденье Идиры говорит ей, что вы обнаружили место, где находится дверь из ее видений. Возьмите ее с собой и найдите дверь.

languages.text: Idira's foresight tells her that the Lord Captain has discovered the location of the door from her visions. She begs the Rogue Trader to take her to this mysterious door.
languages.original_text: Провиденье Идиры говорит ей, что Лорд-капитану удалось обнаружить место, где находится дверь из ее видений. Идира умоляет отвести ее к этой загадочной двери.

traits.locale_text: Idira's foresight tells her that the Lord Captain has discovered the location of the door from her visions. She asks to take her on this expedition and find the mysterious door.
Idira's foresight tells her that the Lord Captain has discovered the location of the door from her visions. She asks to take her on this expedition and find the mysterious door.
Idira's foresight tells her that the Lord Captain has discovered the location of the door from her visions. She asks the Rogue Trader to take her on this expedition and find the mysterious door.
Idira's foresight tells her that the Lord Captain has discovered the location of the door from her visions. She asks the Rogue Trader to take her on this expedition and find the mysterious door.

languages.text: Selon les prédictions d'Idira, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} a découvert l'emplacement de la porte de ses visions. Elle lui demande de l'emmener auprès de cette mystérieuse porte.
languages.original_text: Idira's foresight tells her that the Lord Captain has discovered the location of the door from her visions. She begs the Rogue Trader to take her to this mysterious door.

traits.locale_text: Selon les prédictions d'Idira, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} a découvert l'emplacement de la porte de ses visions. Elle lui demande de l'emmener auprès de cette mystérieuse porte.

languages.text: 通过幻象，伊迪拉得知行商浪人已经通过她描述的幻象找到了大门的位置。伊迪拉恳求行商浪人带她找到那扇神秘的大门。
languages.original_text: Idira's foresight tells her that the Lord Captain has discovered the location of the door from her visions. She begs the Rogue Trader to take her to this mysterious door.

traits.locale_text: 通过幻象，伊迪拉得知行商浪人已经通过她描述的幻象找到了大门的位置。伊迪拉恳求行商浪人带她找到那扇神秘的大门。

languages.text: イディラのビジョンを利用してロード・キャプテンが扉の位置を突き止めることを、彼女は予知によって知った。彼女は自由開拓者に、この謎の扉に自分を同行さてほしいと懇願する。
languages.original_text: Idira's foresight tells her that the Lord Captain has discovered the location of the door from her visions. She begs the Rogue Trader to take her to this mysterious door.

traits.locale_text: イディラのビジョンを利用してロード・キャプテンが扉の位置を突き止めることを、彼女は予知によって知った。彼女は自由開拓者に、この謎の扉に自分を同行さてほしいと懇願する。

languages.text: Idira Voraussicht sagt ihr, dass der Lord Captain den Standort der Tür aus ihren Visionen entdeckt hat. Sie fleht {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}, sie zu dieser mysteriösen Tür zu bringen.
languages.original_text: Idira's foresight tells her that the Lord Captain has discovered the location of the door from her visions. She begs the Rogue Trader to take her to this mysterious door.

traits.locale_text: Idira Voraussicht sagt ihr, dass der Lord Captain den Standort der Tür aus ihren Visionen entdeckt hat. Sie fleht {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}, sie zu dieser mysteriösen Tür zu bringen.

languages.text: La premonición de Idira le indica que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán ha descubierto el lugar de la puerta de sus visiones. Ruega a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente que la lleve a esta puerta misteriosa.
languages.original_text: Idira's foresight tells her that the Lord Captain has discovered the location of the door from her visions. She begs the Rogue Trader to take her to this mysterious door.

traits.locale_text: La premonición de Idira le indica que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán ha descubierto el lugar de la puerta de sus visiones. Ruega a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente que la lleve a esta puerta misteriosa.

languages.text: İdira'nın öngörüleri, Lord Kaptan'ın görülerindeki kapının konumunu bulduğunu söylüyor. Hür Tacir'den onu bu keşif seferinde yanında götürmesini ve gizemli kapıyı bulmasını talep ediyor.
languages.original_text: Idira's foresight tells her that the Lord Captain has discovered the location of the door from her visions. She begs the Rogue Trader to take her to this mysterious door.
